author: Yen Nee Lee
title: US, Italy and Spain have the most coronavirus cases. These charts show the spike in the top countries
description: There are more than 850,000 reported cases of COVID-19 globally, with over 42,000 deaths, data compiled by Johns Hopkins University showed.
content:
A temporary hospital which is been settled up by members of the California National Guard is seen in Indio, California on March 29, 2020.
The ongoing coronavirus pandemic has shown few signs of abating and is now one of the largest threats to the global econ… [+6064 chars]
